segments.text: Your request for compensation makes me surprised . What happened ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It is because of the quality .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Could you tell me the particulars ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I told you that we want first-class goods . So the quality , specification and price are clarified in our contract . Do you remember those details ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The re-examination results indicate that one-third of the goods are not up to standard .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Really ? We began to load the goods after we made sure they were qualified .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I told you the truth . According to the contract , if you fail to honor the contract , we are entitled to cancel it .
segments.speaker: S2
